title: TRICARE
shortDescription: Health coverage for military service members, retirees, and their families.
description: TRICARE is the health care program serving active duty service members, National Guard and Reserve members, retirees, their families, and survivors. TRICARE provides comprehensive coverage for autism services through the Autism Care Demonstration (ACD) program, which covers Applied Behavior Analysis and other evidence-based treatments. Military families in Florida can access TRICARE-authorized providers throughout the state.
benefits: Comprehensive ABA coverage through Autism Care Demonstration
No annual dollar caps on ABA (age limits apply)
Access to network of authorized providers
eligibility: Available to active duty service members, National Guard/Reserve, military retirees, and their eligible family members (dependents).

links.label: TRICARE
